page.title: 11 Our Community Policeman
page.content: Our{Community Policeman, works}1 out of a possible 3 shifts;morning 7am to 3pm, afternoon 3pm to 11pm or nights 11pm to 7am. A community police officer gets to know the area and the people that live there. He usually travels by bicycle, because if he is in a car he cannot always see people or hear them either. The community policeman helps parents by informing them of their children's whereabouts. He also has to tell them if they are troublesome. The police officer that we interviewed had four hobbies; they were gardening, swimming, walking and camping. The policeman has been in the police force for 17 years.
